description: The authorities have been struggling to control a growing number of infections and deaths.
title: Coronavirus: Germany to go into lockdown over Christmas
title_page: Coronavirus: Germany to go into lockdown over Christmas - BBC News
maintext: From Monday, schools across the Stockholm region of Sweden have been asked to switch to distance learning for 13 to 15-year-olds for the first time. Students over the age of 16 returned to digital lessons nationwide on 7 December. Among other measures for the Christmas period, Swedes are also advised to meet a maximum of eight people, gather outdoors if possible and avoid travelling by train or bus.
